name: Balance Knight
description:
Physics-based climbing game


Balance Knight is a game in which the player must advance up a scaffolding shaken by physics.The only controls are moving and jumping.
But it will take some time to get used to the wobbly scaffolding.

Gameplay


The objective of the game is only to go up.
Move through the wobbly scaffolding shaken by physics to reach the goal.

Hard Game


Don't give up if you fall.Next time you will be able to climb.




  • Wobbly scaffold shaken by physics.
  • When you step on the scaffold, it starts moving by your weight.
  • It looks easy, but it's hard.
  • Hard, but it's fun.
